definition: A term used to describe an environment, product, or service that is designed or suitable for children, promoting their well-being, safety, and enjoyment. It is commonly used to refer to places, activities, or objects that are child-friendly and cater to the needs and interests of young individuals.

examples.german: Der Spielplatz ist sehr kinderfreundlich gestaltet.
examples.english: The playground is designed to be very child-friendly.

examples.german: Unser Hotel bietet viele kinderfreundliche Aktivitäten an.
examples.english: Our hotel offers many child-friendly activities.

examples.german: Die Schule legt großen Wert auf eine kinderfreundliche Umgebung.
examples.english: The school places great emphasis on a child-friendly environment.

examples.german: Die Stadt hat viele kinderfreundliche Einrichtungen.
examples.english: The city has many child-friendly facilities.
